cgcloud__Order_Item_Order_Template_Assoc.name: cgcloud__Order_Item_Order_Template_Association__c
cgcloud__Order_Item_Order_Template_Assoc.description: Holds the association of order item templates with order template.

cgcloud__Check_Uniqueness__c.description: Indicates whether the order template and the order item template association is unique.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Hyperlink for the Detail page of the record.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The date from which the association is valid.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The date till which the association is valid.
